clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores
Check for values stored to variables that are never read afterwards.
The
clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
